mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user(username, password, name, mobile, email, create_time, update_time, deleted, role_ids, role_names) VALUES(#{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{mobile}, #{email}, now(), now(), 0, #{roleIds}, #{roleNames})
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_user SET name = #{name}, mobile = #{mobile}, email = #{email}, role_ids = #{roleIds}, role_names = #{roleNames}, update_time = now() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE sys_user SET password = #{password} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE sys_user SET deleted = 1, update_time = now() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_user WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY id DESC
limit #{start}, #{size}
mapper.sql: id, username, name, mobile, email, role_ids AS roleIds, role_names AS roleNames, deleted

sql.if: AND (username LIKE concat('%',#{keywords},'%') OR name LIKE concat('%',#{keywords},'%'))
